1.content:
Kristen rolled out of bed, dreading going to class today. She went to school at the local college near her house so she could continue to live near her parents. Her mom ran a Gym which is also where Kristen worked and her dad was an inventor who worked mostly out home. Although Kristen now lives in her own apartment, she is only a few blocks from her parents.

Kristen sat up on her bed, pulling the covers off her. She stood up and walked across the hallway to her bathroom, running her hands through her messy hair to try and straiten it. She had shoulder length red hair that she usually had either down or in a pony tail as she didn’t care much to style it. She pulled back the shower curtain and began to remove her PJ’s. After a quick shower, she dried of and went to the kitchen for breakfast.

The nicest part of living alone was being able to walk around naked without the fear of anyone seeing her. Although she never really had a reason to be self conscious. She was skinny at her height of 5’6 with a nice pair of large C-cup breasts and respectable hips making for a round butt. 2 bowls of cereal later and she was full. Kristen headed back to her room to get dressed. Opening the dresser, all she saw was a bunch of tank tops. “Ugh, I really need to wash my other clothes.” She mumbled to herself. She hated wearing tank tops as she hated guy looking at her cleavage as she walked to class, but would have to deal with as they were her only clean tops, she grabbed the blue one as blue had always been her favorite color. She luckily found a clean pair of jeans to go with it so she wouldn’t have to wear her running shorts to campus.

Next she opened up her delicates drawer and began scrounging around for a pair of panties and a bra. Unfortunately, like with her jeans and tank top, she was able to find a nice pair of boy shorts to wear, but the only clean bras she had wear push-up’s she had bought when she used to date her old boyfriend. “screw it, I’m already wearing the tank, might as well make my pillows look good in it.” She groaned. After getting dressed, she collected up all her school books and stuffed them in her backpack. Throwing it over her left shoulder, she grabbed her favorite purse and threw it over her right. She checked her phone as she was on her way to campus. to her dismay, she had a text from her mom saying her dad wanted her at the house today before going into work. As usual, she was sure this meant he had some new invention he wanted to test.

5 hours of classes later and she was done. She decided to head strait over to her parents house and finish whatever her dad wanted with her so she could just get to work. Opening the front door slowly, she called out for her dad, “Dad! Where are you?”

Her sister Karen Walked out and said, “He’s in the basement Kristen.” Karen and Kristen had never really gotten along in the house, Karen was 16 now and thought she was queen. She was always dying her hair different colors, today she was a brunette. But Kristen had always been the more well behaved child and Karen always blamed her for when she got in trouble for her grades or other thing.

“Uh, thanks sis…” Kristen replied. Karen just stared at her the whole time as she walked by to get to the basement door. Each stair creaked under her as she went deeper into darkness. Finally at the bottom, there was a glimmer of light coming from under her dad’s work area door. She walked into his lab to see no one inside. On his workbench she found a note saying: “I’m at the gym with your mother right now be back in 10 minutes. Instructions for the new invention are on it.” She turned to see an odd looking machine that was fairly large. It had a screen on one side with two holes on each end about the size of a loaf of bread.

Kristen walked over to the machine and examined it. A message pops up on the touchscreen when she tapped it. Next to the entry hole, you will find a blue bar, it is not a candy bar! This machine takes a special kind of material I made that is very malleable and turns it into anything you want. So choose what you want the bar to become and then insert it into the machine. In 10 seconds or so the finished product will pop out the other side. Just make sure not to lose that blue bar, I could only manage to make one. Kristen flipped through idea in her head of what to test first. Finally she though, “How about another tank top? Ha!” She entered it in and walked to the front of the machine. She stuck the bar in quickly and pulled her hand out quick. She could see inside the machine and was afraid what kind of gear and what not could be in there.

It roared into life making lots of noises till finally she heard it go “Beep boop boo…” She walked over to the screen and saw an error message. Not enough material, please add more “Ugh, Dad wants me to test it and then doesn’t give me enough blue stuff, just like him!” She moved to the front of the machine and looked around for some sort of reverse switch to get it back out. Reluctantly she stuck her hand inside to feel around for it and hopefully grab it out. Unknown to her, the moment she put her hand inside, a message came up on screen, Material found, finishing process. It roared into life again latching hold of her arm. “Oh no, this looks bad…” she spat out before it tugged he to the entrance. It continued to pull on her barely getting past her shoulders till her chest reached the bread loaf sized entrance and got stuck. “Thank goodness for this bra, it might just save me.” She said with her head inside the machine. “Machine jam, applying compression formula”

“Wait, what was that?” Before she could find out a nozzle opened above the machine’s entrance and strayed a blue liquid on to Kristen. “Beginning hard entry sequence.” “What? That sounds painful!” She screamed. The machine roared into life twice as loud and began to pull hard. To her surprise, her body began to get through the entrance, only now it was getting crushed into a perfectly rectangular shape as it went in. She could feel a bunch of rollers and other things against her body as she was inside the machine. She then felt herself get dropped on some sort of conveyor belt where she saw herself on a piece of reflective metal, her entire body now in the shape of a large rectangle when suddenly she stopped, unable to move or talk. “Combining Materials…” “Oh great, what now?” she thought. A hand went past her head and into an opening returning with the blue bar. I moved it down and set it on the center of the flat top of her body that once was her chest. A second later a roller came out and smoothed the blue bar into a sheet that covered most of the Kristen bar.

The conveyor belt began moving the blue covered Kristen bar. As she went along, many hand type things would come down and squish and move her body about. The first few time felt very odd, but it began to feel more normal over time. One of the hands even shocked her as it did its work and that didn’t seem to phase her. “Product finished!” The machine announced as the exit hole opened up and a shiny blue tank top shot out into a tray.

Upstairs, Karen had gotten very anxious as to how long Kristen had been downstairs. Karen Figured that since Kristen had been down there so long, their dad must have made something cool for once and she was hogging it. Karen ran down into the basement quickly, knocking open the lab door in her haste. She looked around for her sister but no one was there.

Kristen could hear Karen come in and knew she needed her help. She tried as hard as she could to resist, but couldn’t and managed to say from her form, “Hey Karen, little help here!” Karen heard her sister but didn’t know where it came from. “Ummmm, on the other side of the machine, in the tray.” Karen heard what she said, but it all sounded so weird. She figured she look there though. Walking around the large machine, Karen came to the exit when there sat a shiny blue tank top.

She picked it up and said, “Ummmm, ok, do you want me to have it or something?”

“No you can’t have me!” Shouted Kristen.

Karen looked over the tank slowly, “Uh, Krissy?”

“Yes its me! Dad’s stupid machine did this to me!”

“It turned you into a tank top? But… how… I mean, your just like a piece of clothing now. You feel kind of like skin, but also like rubber.”

“Oh my god? I’m a tank top… and I don’t know how it did this to me, I got my hand caught inside and it just grabbed me and used me for material. I don’t even know how I can talk or see and hear right now.”

“Well I have no idea what to do with you, but I know exactly what to do with this tank top!” Karen smirked.

“What? No! I just look like a tank, you can’t just use me!” Kristen shouted.

“Sorry Sis, all my tanks are dirty and I need to hit the gym.” Karen balled up Kristen into one hand and ran upstairs to her room. she took off her top and jeans and slipped on a pair of shorts and her sister. “You’re not very big Krissy, you should have made yourself a bit bigger, but at least your stretchy enough to work.” From upstairs the sisters could hear the door to their house open and close as there dad finally got home. He went downstairs to look for Kristen. When he couldn’t find her he searched for Karen.
1.title: Adventures of Kristen part 1 intro/ gym wear

11.content:
“Karen, where are you?” He called out.

“In my room Dad!” She shouted back.

He opened her door and saw her standing there in her running outfit. “Have you seen your sister? I can’t seem to find her and want to know how the test went. And where’d you get that new top?”

“Dad! It’s not new! Its me!” Kristen pleaded.

“Ugh, Krissy! Don’t tell him, not till I work out in you!”

“Dad! I got caught inside your machine and it mixed me with that blue bar stuff and spat me out like this. Karen found me and thinks just cuz I’m a tight tank top that she can work out in me! Tell her to take me off!”

“Well I need to find out how the machine did this to you. But as long as you got sprayed with the compression fluid and have enough of the Blueium in you, you should be fine. But until I figure out how to fix you, it’s probably a good idea for Karen to keep a close eye on you, and wearing you seems like a great idea!”

Karen looked down at Kristen, “Awesome! Lets go for a run Sis.”
“And make sure to tell your mother the whole story so she know why Kristen won’t be there to work the desk… Although, if the machine did to Kristen what I think it did, your sister could have tons of new jobs to do at the gym. Now go while I try to figure all this out.” Karen kissed her dad on the cheek as she ran past on her way to her parents Gym wearing her Kristen-tank-top.

Karen figured she’d get some use out of her sister in case her dad did find a way to fix her, so the second she was out the from door, she was jogging. Her goal was to move about as much as she could with Kristen on to punish her sister for always being such a know it all. “Hey Sis, why don’t you turn it down a notch while I’m here supporting you!” Karen just chuckled and kept on jogging.

Their dad quickly went to work in his lab trying to find out what had happened. He looked through all the logs on the computer for the machine trying to figure out exactly what it did to turn his daughter into a shirt. After looking into the logs for an hour or so, he was sure he had it figured out. The Blueium bar he made has the ability form into any shape without getting damaged or worn down. And the compression fluid, when sprayed onto something allows that substance to be compressed without doing harm to its structure. Somehow the fluid allowed Kristen’s body to be crushed a little bit without being hurt, and once the Blueium touched her, the fluid must have reacted with it and during the molding process mixed it deep into Kristen.

If he was right, she should still be herself just with properties of Blueium (being molded without injury) and of the compression fluid (and become any size). The only thing he couldn’t figure out was that if she was one with the Blueium, she should be able to change her shape freely, he didn’t get why she was stuck.

About 2 hours later, Karen returned home sweaty after a long and hard workout. Although warn out, Kristen was still mad she had to be her sister’s gym clothes. The only thing had to be happy about was that when they left, their mom said that Dad had called and he thought he had it figured out. She was ready to be normal again. “Come on Karen, take me down stairs, lets see what Dad’s come up with.”

“I know, I know, I’m going…” Karen said panting from her work out. She slowly made her way to the basement where her father was eagerly waiting. “Hey Dad, any luck?” Karen said uncaring.

“I think I have it. I figured out that it was a mix of the compression fluid and the Blueium that allowed the machine to do this to her. And I found some wiring hanging out near the exit of the machine. Blueium reacts oddly to electricity and shocks. If it gets shocked, it loses it ability to form shapes properly.”

“Yeah, I felt a small shock towards the end right before I came out!” Kristen blurted out.

“That’s what I figured. If so, all we should have to do is do it again and you’ll be like new!” He pulled a small handheld device out of his pocket and touched it to Karen’s chest. A small bolt shock shot through Kristen and into Karen.

“Ouch Dad! Give me some warning next time!” Karen yelled.

“Sorry honey, but please take off your sister now.” She did so reluctantly, setting Kristen on the floor. “Alright Kristen, I need you to concentrate really hard and try to move.” Just like that, the Kristen tank began to move around a bit on the floor. “Good, now concentrate as hard as you can on being you again.” Slowly the tank top began to expand and move, growing arms and legs and eventually a head. In under a minute Kristen was laying on the floor in front of them.

“Oh my gosh, it worked!” Kristen squealed! “Thanks so much Daddy!”

“Well now Kristen, your not totally back to normal you see…”

“What do you mean?” Kristen asked.

“Well I’ve just taught you how to restore yourself, You are still a Human-Blueium hybrid. Your form can be changed at anytime with enough force or the right machine. If you wanted, you could put yourself right back into the machine and become anything else. Which you can do if you want now that I’ve fixed that pesky wire. Just remember, if your form gets changed and you get shocked, you’re stuck till you’re shocked again.”

Kristen looked down at her hands, “Cool!” she exclaimed.

“Race you upstairs sis.” Karen said as she took off running. Kristen turned and run behind her up the stairs. Karen barely made it upstairs first and right as Kristen was about to go though the doorway, Karen slammed the door shut and her sister ran into it at full speed. Karen opened the door to find her sister flattened thin as paper against the door but now she had a blue tint to her. “Haha, got you!” She peels her off the door and holds her out in front of her. “Looks like you go blue when you’re not you, interesting…” Karen said. She then crumpled up her sister and threw her aside. She walked away laughing.

Kristen’s dad came up the stairs to see a crumpled up blue ball on the ground. He picked it up and undid it to see his daughter’s blue face on it. “Guess when anything happens, the Blueium kicks in and keeps you fine.” He then throws her over the couch and walks away saying, “You still have work in 15 minutes, so I’d fix yourself up and get going!”

111.content:
Arriving home from work at the gym, Kristen threw off her shoes and socks and flopped over onto the couch on her side. Her red hair falling over her face. After a few minutes, she finally began to fall asleep when suddenly the front door swung open and Kristen’s sister Karen, now sporting blonde highlights in her hair, came in with a bunch of her friends. The group was talking so loudly, it was impossible for her to fall asleep. All she wanted was a short nap before heading back to her place.

They walked through the living room and sat down around the room in the chairs continuing to talk loudly. Kristen was about ready to to sit up and shout at her sister and her annoying friends when suddenly they all stopped talking and Karen said, “Hey Kristen, we’re all going to a party tonight, wanna come?” She thought that maybe this was her sister’s way of repaying her for wearing Kristen as a tank top for working out. Which maybe seem odd, but Kristen had accidentally fallen into one of her father’s new inventions and it had a drastic side effect. Her body could now be molded into almost any size and shape imaginable, at which point she would turn blue due the Blueium that had been in the machine and had mixed into her. That was when she found out that she could change her form fairly freely, but would get stuck if she got any sort of electric shock. But hearing her usually annoying sister invite her to a party was a shock of a whole different kind. Kristen propped herself up on the couch with a smile and looked at her sister and her friends. “We thought it would be cool to have you there.” Karen told her sister in an honest sounding tone.

Although her sister was younger than her, Kristen didn’t go to very many parties. “Umm, sure, I’d love to come!”

“Ok good! All I ask is a small favor…” Karen said as if she was some kind of mob boss. Kristen immediately dropped the smile and stared at her sister. She knew that ever since the accident her sister was going to take advantage of her new abilities and was sure this had something to do with them.

“Let me guess, you want me to be something for the party?” Kristen said glaring at her sister.

“Well the party is formal thing and you have nothing to wear, so I was going to make you into something that wouldn’t be noticed at a party.” Kristen then realized thather sister was actually trying to be nice when she offered for her to come along. She really did want to go to the party with them but had nothing even close to formal. And since the accident her dad had told her to make sure to “exercise” her abilities so she could get used to them and learn to control them better.

“Fine, but under two condition. I don’t want to be worn by you or one of your friends and you can’t just leave me sitting around, you have to carry me around. And did you tell your friends what happened to me?”

“Of course, it doesn’t need to be a secret Sis, the more people that know about it, then the more people that can use you if they need to. After all, I bet you could be really useful in a lot of situations, not to mention games.” Karen said.

“Well we’ll have to see about that.” Kristen replied. “So when is the party?”

“Its late tonight, but I had some things I wanted to test with you before then… which is also why my friends are here.” Right after Karen said that, her and all her friends stood up and walked over to the malleable girl. Kristen knew that this was not a good sign. Before she could react, Karen and all of her friends dog piled on top of Kristen, crushing her into the couch.

The all slid off the pile one at a time and as Karen, being the last to get off, moved aside, they all looked down. Each of them were speechless, except of course Karen, “See, I told you she was malleable now.” She said as she picked up the flat piece of blue material in the shape of her sister.

“So that’s really your sister?” one of the girls asked shyly.

“Yup, I told you she was like rubber now, she can be molded into any shape and we even have a machine to make her into complex stuff.”

Kristen finally oriented herself and looked at her sister who was easily holding her up with one hand. “You have to warn my before you flatten me! That’s what dad said. Especially since it still take me like 10 minutes to fix my body shape after you mess with it.”

“Oh, you’ll be fine Sis, stop over reacting. And since you want a warning, You’re about to become a lot more stretched out…” Just as Kristen said that, their dad walked through the front door and looked at his youngest daughter holding up a large blue thing in the shape of a girl.

“Looks like you all are having some fun, I heard about the party tonight. Just make sure to be careful and be home before 12, we’re taking a family trip to the beach tomorrow and I want us to be up early for it.” He then walked past the group of girls and headed into the basement most likely to work on his latest invention.

“Dad! Ugh… great, and what was that about stretching?” Kristen asked her sister a bit annoyed that again her dad didn’t care what Karen was doing to the rubber girl as long as they kept it safe.

“Oh, it’ll be fun, don’t worry, and I’ll actually be able to use this as a way to make you into something for the party, Hehe.” At this point, Kristen knew she wasn’t going to be able to get out of this situation since she promised to go to the party with her sister but not as herself, hopefully she would have an easier job that when she was the tank top.

Karen rolled Kristen up tight and stuck her under her arm walking into the kitchen. Then, Karen, with the help of her friends laid Kristen out flat on their parents huge marble countertop. Kristen tried to move in her flattened state but it was to no avail, as when she finally started to get her head up, Karen just set the toaster on top of it and pushed it back down again. Now only being able to hear, Kristen could make out the sounds of her sister rummaging though the drawers obviously looking for something.

When she could hear all the drawers close, Karen lifted the toaster off her head so the malleable blue girl could see her soon to be fate. Karen and two of the friends had rolling pins in there hands and another had a spatula. “Don’t look so worried sis,” Karen said even though she couldn’t see her sister’s face in the blue, she knew what she was thinking, “I’m not going to bake you, just make you a bit skinnier, you should thank me really…” Before Kristen could even get in a response they started working on her, pushing done hard with the rollers going up and down her body making her feel taller, skinnier, and worst of all, flatter all at the same time.

In just a few minutes they stopped with the rolling pins and backed away. She felt very odd now, like her body was only a few feet wide and like her head was now just two feet from her head. The girl with the spatula quickly went to work on one of her corners and had it pried up quick. Karen grabbed hold of it with one hand and pulled hard. SLLUURRPPPPP! He body come off the counter with the sound of rubber being silly putty being pulled off a wall.

“You should be just about the right size. . . Here Jenny, you were in girl scouts, can you tie her for me?” Karen handed the new shiny blue ribbon over to Jenny, who, before Kristen could even ask what she meant by tie, had pulled out a hair band and proceeded to tie Kristen around it in a neat bow. Jenny then handed it back over to Karen who took a second to look it over.

Kristen was now incredibly mad at her sister. Making her a pancake is on thing, but flattening her like that and then tying her in a bow just felt wrong, not to mention she couldn’t seem to speak with her body in such an odd shape. “You’re so shiny when I mash you up sis, its like your meant to be made into clothes!” Kristen just tried to ignore that comment and remember that all of this was so she would get to go to the party. Sure she wouldnt be able to meet anyone as a bow on a head band but it was better than sitting inside all night and after all, her dad did say she needed to practice her abilities, something Karen was glad to help with. She could especially tell by the way Karen was looking at her while holding her in her hands. “Oh, you’re the best sister ever, look how pretty you are! I cant wait to wear you, but first things first, we need to do our hair. And just for your protection…” Karen pulled out a small object that looked like a flashlight but was only the side of her thumb. “One of dad’s new inventions, to make sure you stay safe while you’re not you.” Kristen knew what was coming and closed her non existent eyes as lightning shot out of the device and into her. “There, now your just a bow till the end of the night, now stay here while we get ready!” Karen said tossing the hair band with its new bow onto the coffee table as her and her friends ran upstairs to get ready in her bathroom.
111.title: Party Favor

1111.content:
Ugh, I wouldn’t mind my sister using my abilities for fun if she did’t treat me so much like an object when I’m changed. Sure I look just like a regular hair band, but there is a very flat girl twisted up on it. Then Kristen heard the front door open and close, but couldn’t see who it was because of her current situation. All she could hear were soft foot steps all the way over to the coffee table when she suddenly felt herself getting picked up. It was her mom, who was the only one in the family that didn’t know about Kristen’s abilities yet as she had forgotten to tell her when Kristen had worked her last shift at the Gym their parents owned. All her mom say was a shiny blue hair band.

“I really wish the girls wouldn’t just leave this stuff lying around the house. Although, come to think of it, I don’t think I’ve ever seen this before, must be new. That bow is really pretty too, I’ll have to ask her where she got it. Oh well, I’ll just put it back on the table so she knows where it is.” Kristen’s mom then tosses the blue band onto the table and walked away as it bounced once and then landed on its side with the Kristen bow aiming towards the staircase.

I guess this is better now that I can see when they come back down, but Mom really should be nicer to our stuff, especially anything shiny and blue now… Finally Karen and her friends began to emerge down the stairs, all of them looking very fancy with their hair done up and dresses on. Karen walked over and picked up the her sister-hair band and slid her over her head and down past her ears getting her snuggly in place.

She brought her hand up and patted the shiny living bow on top, making sure it was in the right place. “Ah, now my outfit is complete and I’m ready for this party! So girls, how do I look?” Karen asked to her friends who were all standing around her.

“Amazing!” One of them said. “Beautiful.” another added. “Kristen really pulls the whole outfit together.” A black haired girl said. Which for some reason made Kristen a bit happy on the inside. She may have hated being treated like an object but she did like it when she did a good job as what ever she was. And when they were leaving and Karen passed by the mirror on the way out, Kristen got a glimpse of herself and realized that they had all be right, she was a really shiny blue bow, and for the first time she didn’t really mind being used by her sister.

Being a tank top had been really hard work for Kristen and she was also acting as kind of a sports bra then, but now, she could just relax on top of her sister’s head. Once they were all at the party they started having a really great time, all the girls were chatting up the guys and Karen was getting really friendly with this one guy Brad. They had been talking for over and hour and Kristen could tell that Karen liked this guy, even while she couldn’t see her face.

Eventually Brad and Karen were sitting on the couch and began making out. Luckily for the disgusted Kristen, as brad ran his hand through Karen’s hair he knocked the lovely blue bow off her hair band and Kristen fell to the floor beside the couch without Karen even realizing what had happened. After a few more minutes, Karen and her new boy toy moved to another room and left poor Kristen just laying on the floor. Finally Mel, one of her sister’s blonde friends walked past and noticed the bow. “Oh my, how did you get separated from Karen? Oh well, I’ve got you now, hope you don’t mind if I test something on you. The second Karen told us about your abilities I’ve wanted to see if you were really like rubber. But first I have to make you morphable again.”

Mel walks with Kristen in hand over to an electric socket and sticks the end of the bow in for a brief second and pulls her out the second she gets jolted. “Wow, that hurts, but I bet you’ll get used to it. Plus I hope this will feel a lot better.” Mel says as she slowly unravels the bow-girl and then crushes the ribbon in her hands to make a small ball about half the size of a ping-pong ball. “All’s good so far. Now for the fun part…” She takes a near by pen and pushes a hole into her new clay ball friend. Setting the pen aside, Mel brings her lips to the hole in the bottom and begins to blow with all her effort, forcing air into the rubber girl. Kristen could feel the air push on her and she quickly felt her body begin to expand.

Over and over Mel would blow all her air into Kristen and then come up for big gulps of air. As Kristen begin to spread out and become thinner and thinner, it become easier to inflate her. As she started getting to a respectable size though, Mel noticed that Kristen’s malleable body was too heavy and she would just end up like a basket ball. So she carefully let all the air out of her and brought her into the other room where there was a helium tank. “Perfect! This should make you nice and buoyant.”

Shoving the nozzle inside of Kristen, she opened the tank and waited as the helium flowed in expanding her body out quickly. This sensation sent wave of intense feeling through Kristen as she could feel herself get larger and larger and yet thinner. But the weirdest feeling of all was that she was now beginning to float all on her own. In just another 30 seconds she felt like she was about to pop, and right at the moment, Mel turned off the helium and took out the nozzle. She tied up the bottom of Kristen where the nozzle had been and just like that she was a balloon bobbing around in the air. Mel quickly attached a string from a previously popped balloon and let got of Kristen so she rushed up through the air and stopped suddenly hitting the end of her string causing her to bounce a few times up and down till she settled with just the air in the room blowing her about.

“I would shock you again to keep you this way too, but I don’t know if that will pop you, but that’s ok, I don’t think you’ll try and turn back like this anyway.” Mel said as she tied the string around her wrist and began to talk to other party-goer’s. Kristen was just barely starting to get used to the feeling of being flat, let alone tied up with herself, and now she was dealing with what was turning into the pleasure of being inflated. She liked the feeling of all the gas inside her that was trying to escape and the odd sensation of flying but having no control over where you go.

After another few hours at the party, Mel finally had to go home, so she went around until she found a sharpie marker and wrote ‘Property of Karen’ right on the side of the balloon, unknowing to Mel that it was right over Kristen’s chest. The balloon girl was too happy though to care that someone had just written on her. Mel then took untied the string off of her wrist and tied it to the banister.

Luckily for Kristen, it was getting time for Karen to need to head home. Brad from upstairs with her and kissed at the top of the stairs as Brad headed home. Karen noticed the note on the side of the balloon and din’t get why someone had writing that the balloon was her property on the side. After a moment though, she reached up to her hair band and noticed the missing bow. Walking close to the balloon and pulling it close to her face she whispered, “Ummm, Krissy?”

“Oh hey Karen, I didn’t notice you all the way down there, Hehe.” Kristen said taunting her sister over her new flying ability.

“Don’t be too cocky, I could just pop you… or let all the air out and watch as you buzz around the room deflating into a tiny piece of rubber.” Karen Retorted.

“Don’t you dare! now tie me around your wrist and lets head home.” Karen did as her sister said and walked out the door with her sis bumping her balloon-y body on the top of the door frame. “Oof! Watch it!” Kristen shouted and her sister just snickered.

Once they were home, Karen got out the mini-shocker, but before Kristen had a chance to tell her that Mel had already reversed the shock, Karen activated it and a bolt of electricity shot through the air and hit Kristen. Before either could react, a loud POP shot through the house and Kristen’s shredded body dropped through the air and landed on the floor while Karen was still stunned at what happened. “OUCH!”

“Oh my god Sis, are you ok?” Karen said as she dropped to her knees picking ups the popped balloon.

“Yeah, I think I’m still in one piece thank goodness. And actually Mel shocked me earlier so now I’m back to being stuck, so if you wouldn’t mind giving mt a quick jolt so I can reform myself.” Karen quickly pulled the mini-shocker back out and gave her sis another jolt. “Just please deflate me next time…” Kristen told Karen as she began to reform herself.

It took her much longer than she expected to turn back as she was having trouble figuring out where parts of her body were. When she finally felt back to normal, she looked up off the floor to see her sister trying to cover herself laughing. “Whats so funny?” Karen just kept laughing and pointed at Kristen’s breasts. The reformed girl looked down to see ‘Property of Karen’ written across her chest in black marker.

“Guess I own ’em now, Hehe.” Karen said giggling. Kristen just stared at her, got up and headed to the bathroom to wash up for the night and head to her place to go to bed, ready to go to the beach tomorrow and see what fun she could have there, as long as Karen doesn’t mess it up…
1111.title: Party Favor part 2

11111.content:
Kristen woke up nice and early. She couldn’t wait to go to the beach today. Her family had been planning this trip for a while and she could believe it was finally time. She had always loved the beach as a little girl, even when her sister would try to force her into the water to swim around. Kristen wasn’t a big fan of swimming, but that was ok, because today she was just going to relax on the beach. Kristen chose her favorite swim suit, a blue bikini with a lovely flower pattern. And then threw on her flip flops and a towel around her waist.

Since Kristen lived by her self, she could leave when ever she wanted to, but she still wanted to get there as soon as possible so she just threw on a white dress over her bikini and headed out the door without even bothering to straiten her hair like she usually does. Kristen’s parents and her sister Karen, had left much earlier in the morning, so she knew they would already be waiting there for her. Kristen hopped in her sporty little hatchback and took off.

In just under 30 minutes she was there. She parked along side her parents car and began to search for them on the beach. She looked all over and couldn’t seem to find them anywhere, but she was also starting to get hot so she decided to head back to her car and drop off her white dress and search for them in the near by markets. She figured that maybe they had gone to get some food since it was almost lunch time. She wandered about through the markets looking and calling there names, getting looks from all the farmers while she did it.

She took a break from looking for a second and stood in a back alley trying to think of where they could be. Without noticing, a figure came up behind her and lunged at her. Luckily for Kristen, it was just her sister, unluckily though, Karen had some new device in her hands. Kristen turned around just in time to see her sister shove the new device towards her, it making contact with her side. A shock shot through her body and she froze in place. “Hmmm, I wondered what might happen if you got a shock while still human. Looks like dad was right though, it has the same effect, you just get stuck.”

Karen, who for the beach had dyed her hair blonde, walks around her now frozen in place sister admiring the fun she knew she’d be able to have now that she knows this. “What is that thing?” Kristen can barely get out through her frozen lips, “It looks different than the mini-shocker.”

“Oh this thing? Its Dad’s upgrade on the mini-shocker. He calls it the Micro-Electric Zapper, but I just call it the MEZ’er for short. It works just like the mini-shocker, except for two things. The first is that the zap is much less painful, and the second is my favorite part. It was actually my idea that Dad added to it as a way to keep you even safer.”

Karen had already convinced their dad that wearing Kristen was a good way to keep and eye on her, so she knew that keeping her safe was not a good thing for her. “And it will actually save you some walking too Sis,” Karen said as she held the device about an inch away from Kristen, “Don’t worry, this should be fast.” Karen pressed a button on the side of the MEZ’er and one of the ends opened up and a white glow came from the inside.

Kristen then felt a very odd sensation, like her whole side was being stretched. She quickly figured out what it was doing though as it continued to suck on her, drawing her body into the device. In only about 20 seconds almost all of her was in it and all she could do was look out with a frozen face of terror as it crushed what was left of her into its compartment. Then the front closed up and it dropped to the ground rolling to its side till Karen picked it up. “Wow, Dad really is good at this stuff. This little thing about the size of a lightsaber from StarWars can not only shock you but also suck in your whole form and compact it into a small tube so I can carry you around… I mean keep you safer, hehe.” She laughed a bit at what she had almost said. Karen then dropped the MEZ’er (which now contained her very compacted sister) into her bag and headed to meet up with their parents at an Italian restaurant.

Walking up to the table she dropped her bag by her chair and sat down about getting ready to eat when she noticed her Dad giving her a nasty look. “Oh yeah, sorry, forgot I had her.” Karen blurted out. She russled her hand about in her bag till she pulled the MEZ’er out and hold it over the table. Just that morning, there Dad had spent a long time explaining to their mother about Kristen’s new abilities. She still wasn’t sure what to expect though. Holding the device aiming down, Karen pressed a button on the side of the MEZ’er and out dropped a small blue tube about twice as big as a AA battery.

“Hey Karen! Thats really small in there… seriously, some warning or something next time!” The little blue tube shouted at her sister.

“K-Kristen?” Their mom mumbled, a bit in disbelief. “Dad told me what happened, but, just wow.”

“Oh yeah, I was gonna tell you eventually but I didn’t want you to freak out. But… yeah. So I’m pretty malleable now. I can be all sorts of shapes and objects.”

“Objects?” her Mom asks.

“Yeah, I can be formed into all sorts of things, and whenever I’m all malleable, I turn blue. And I hate to ask, but Karen, do you mind showing her what you can do with me?”

“I thought you’d never ask!” her sister said jokingly. Karen didn’t hesitate to pick up Kristen and quickly tore the blue cylinder in half. “and before you complain, I checked with Dad, and his research says that all we have to do is bring the blueium back together and you can reform.” Kristen still would have complained if Karen hadn’t already gone to work on one half of her flattening her out into 2 triangles with string coming off them and connect at one corner. Karen then went to work on the smaller half of the blue cylinder that was left and just made it into two triangles connected at one corner and then she tied the other two corners. “Be right back mom!” She said as she headed to the bathroom to change real quick.

When she came back to the table, she was still wearing her white top and skirt, except she was now holding her regular bikini in her hand, and her Mom could easily notice the blue straps going around Karen’s neck. “And just like that I can take Krissy with me where ever I go.”

“So even thought Kristen doesn’t like the water, she can still go in the ocean with you there to support her!” Their Mom said excitedly realizing now that Kristen’s abilities could actually be helpful. “Then what are we waiting for? Lets get into the ocean!” Their Mom grabbed Karen’s arm and practically dragged her away from the table she was some exited. Karen Barely managed to grab her bag and she got out of her chair and they headed to the door.

Their Dad just said there looking unsurprised and asked for the waiter to bring the check figuring he’d give them and chance to bond over Kristen’s unusual situation. Karen and her Mom quickly made it to the beach but took them forever to find a place to set up their towels, so when they finally did, they were both to tired to swim and just laid down to relax for a bit. Karen then took off her top and skirt and set them aside so her Mom could see Kristen.

“Wow, shes so shiny when shes not herself.” Kristen’s mom said, staring amazed that her daughter was currently just a bikini. “Wait, the other night there was a shiny blue bow on the table, was that…?”

“Yup, that was me.” Piped up the swimsuit.

“Oh my, well you looked lovely honey.”

“Thanks Mom.” was the only way she really knew how to respond to her mother saying she made a lovely accessory, even though she did like when she was good looking as whatever she was.

Their Mom was finally getting over her daughter’s new abilities and laid down to relax. Karen spent the first 30 minutes tanning and talking to her Mom, till their Dad finally found them. Karen went ahead and left her parents alone and headed out into the ocean. “I know you were always scared of going into the ocean Sis, but its not that bad. I bet you’ll even like it.” Karen stepped into the water feeling the coldness on her feet and having a chill run up her spine. “Ok, so its gonna be a bit cold, but I doubt you’ll even notice it aside from maybe my nips pointing through, but I trust you to stop them showing.”

“Fine, then I trust you wont lose your top in the ocean like you did last year.” Kristen retorted. Karen had almost forgotten about that incident and realized that if that happened again, it would be way worse than having to run to shore covering herself. Karen just tried not to think about it as she headed further and further off of shore to the point where there was a few feet of water between her and the bottom.

Kristen would have been trying her hardest to get back to shore right then if it weren’t for the fact she was stuck as her sister’s swimsuit. “Come on, lets head back, the water is really deep right here. What would happen if my bottoms slid off and fell to the ocean floor, I don’t know if you can swim that deep.” Kristen said scared.

“Oh calm down scaredie-cat, your tied around me tight. But if you really want, we can head back to shore, but I’m going to tan my back after this which means I’m going to untie you.” Karen knew Kristen wasn’t happy about the idea either of the wind picking her up and carrying her off.
11111.title: Beach Trip

111111.content:
Fine, but lay on me so I can’t blow away!” Kristen told her sister.

“Haha alright, and I bet your the first person ever to say that sentence.” Karen giggled as she swam in. And just as promised, Karen laid face down on the beach towel and untied her sister from around her back and neck. But that especially please Karen because, in this position, Kristen’s mouth was on the front of the bikini, which was currently being smothered, meaning she didn’t have to listen to her sister and could just relax for a bit.

About an hour later, her Mom woke her up saying that their Dad had apparently figured something out that he thought Karen might like. The only condition was that Karen had to leave Kristen at the beach with her Mom while she and her Dad headed home in their parents car.

Karen couldn’t care less about losing her bikini, she just couldn’t wait to see what her dad had in store for her. She new it had to be a new invention or something that would help her to have some fun with Kristen. So she retied Kristen around her back and neck and headed to the nearby changing rooms with her bag returning in a few minutes back in her regular clothes with an aver clothe bikini under them.

Karen gave the MEZ’er to her Mom and headed to the car with her Dad. Kristen’s Mom went to the changing rooms and hung up Kristen on the hooks on the walls. “I hope you don’t mind Krissy, but your just so pretty, I have to try you on.”

“Can I get tomorrow off of work them?” Kristen bartered.

“Deal!” Her mom said, “But you look a bit small for me, I’m gonna need to change that.” Her mom gave her no time to react as she grabbed Kristen’s bikini bottoms of a hook and stretched them out in her hands. Setting them aside, she did the same with Kristen’s top, although it took a bit longer to get there right shape. “Don’t worry Krissy, I took pottery in college, this is almost the same.”

Kristen just groaned as her Mom stretched her into the right shape to be worn. Once she was ready, her Mom, got out of her one piece and slipped on Kristen. She stepped outside, and even with the light of dusk, Kristen still shimmered. “You make me feel so young again. I bet you be just as useful at the gym, but doing other tasks that only you could do.” Kristen knew that once her Mom figured out about her blueium secret, she would want to use it to help out the business. But being honest with her self, Kristen thought I might actually be kind of fun to use her abilities at work to get things done or help people out.

“So are you getting used to this?” Kristen’s Mom asked her bikini as she walked along the beach.

“I’m getting used to it. And to be honest, it can be fun, but usually not when Karen does it without asking.” She responded.

“Yeah, but she’s just teasing you, she secretly jealous you have an ability that no one else has.” It made Kristen feel a bit better about her situation knowing that her sister just wants to be like her. After over an hour over talking while walking back and forth on the beach, her Mom changed back into her regular clothes ready to head home.

“I know your not a big fan of this, but you are easier to carry this way…” She trailed off as she stuck her hand into her bag, Kristen didn’t realize what she was talking about till she pulled out the MEZ’er and put it against the bikini bottom and top that were laying on the dressing room floor. In a moment, Kristen was sucked up into and squashed up tight. “You father also told me to press this button.” Kristen’s Mom pressed a button on the outside under the storage button labeled compression storage.

Pressing the button, the MEZ’er vibrated into life for a few seconds and then stopped making a beeping noise saying it was done. Kristen now felt very uncomfortable and didn’t know why. “Wow, that made you a lot lighter, awesome!” Her Mom tossed the MEZ’er into Kristen’s car’s glovebox, and headed home using a spare set of keys for Kristen’s car.

She drove to Kristen’s apartment and before getting out of the car decided to open up the MEZ’er. Out dropped a small blue coin about the size of a dime. “Well that explains why you got so light, you just 10 cents of your former self.” She laughed to herself, “Well I hope you haven’t had too much of the water yet, you make not work at the gym, but you’re baby-sitting your cousin Kim and you know how she likes swimming. And I was going to let you turn back, but to be honest, I don’t want to figure out how that stupid device works tonight, and you can just go in my purse till tomorrow.” She stuck the MEZ’er back in the glovebox and headed inside dropping the newly minted Kristen coin in her purse as she walked over to the couch and passed out after a long day.
111111.title: Beach Trip part 2

1111111.content:
After over-sleeping much past when she was planning on waking up, Kristen’s mom finally rolled off the couch in her daughter’s apartment. She lumbered down the hall to the bedroom and looked inside to see if Kristen had woken up yet. Peering inside, she saw that the bed was still in the same condition it was in the night before when she was trying to decide where to sleep. Which is when she remembered where Kristen was, or more, where she had put Kristen. Heading back to the kitchen, She opened her purse and pulled out the now familiar blue coin. “Almost forgot you were in here, That would have been bad if I would have spent you huh? Hehe” She chuckled. “Well I better make sure I don’t forget you in there again, I’ll have to keep you on me though.” Her Mom moved the coin around her back and Kristen already knew where it was going before her Mom had even begun to open her back pocket.

While held in place by the tightness of the pants pocket, her mom proceeded to gather some clothes for Kristen to wear once they were home and she could figure out how to make Kristen regular again. “We gotta get you home and changed back fast, I have to drop you off at your cousin Kim’s house for babysitting in an hour.” It was then that Kristen recalled she had to babysit her annoying cousin and knew then that being a coin in someone’s pocket was probably not the worst thing that was going to happen to her today. After a 20 minute drive home stuffed between her mother and a car seat, she was finally pulled out of the now very stuffy and sweaty pocket and into the light of day again, holding her in front of her dad. “See Jack, the compressor worked just like you said, look how small and light she is, demonstrating so by flipping her in the air to which her currently passing by sister jokingly said ‘Tails!’ not even realizing what it was that her mom had.

Her dad swiped Kristen out of the air quickly before Karen could get a good look at her. “Hey, Hun, I’ve got an idea, follow me.” Kristen’s dad, Jack, said to her mother, Jennifer, and he headed to the basement.

“What was that all about?” His wife asked immediately after he had closed the door to the basement.

“Well, most of Karen and Kristen’s time together is just good fun, but I don’t want Karen to get carried away with Kristen so vulnerable. Then we would have to search every vending machine for a mile to find her. At least not till my Blueium Finder is finished.” Well that’s reassuring, Kristen thought. “Now come on, I’ll show you how to make her normal again. “It actually quite easy once she is in her compressed form from the MEZ’er.” He walks to the side of the machine with the control panel and points to a small slot on the side, the perfect size for a quarter, or something the size as one at least. “Now watch closely.” He slid his daughter lightly into the slot and began going through a few menu’s showing his wife what to press.

From inside the machine, all she could hear was her dad mention something about making sure to press restore and not recycle and that the process would take a few minutes. At this point, Kristen was just happy that soon she wouldn’t be able to be lost between the cushions on the couch. Soon enough after her parents had left waiting for the process to finish, she heard the machine buzz into life as a latch released and she rolled down a number of chutes on her side before coming to rest in the depths of the machine. Luckily for her it quickly got to work, flattening and stretching her, adding steam and pumping her full of air. It wasn’t the most comfortable thing in the world, but she could feel her size increasing and quickly. As she had heard, it took just a few minutes and she could move all of her limbs again. In moments a large door opened and a slide dropped down as a piston behind her pushed her out. She slid down, and unfortunately again, the machine had not restored any clothes along with her and she landed on the cold floor. She clenched up quickly as the cold shot through he uncovered bottom.

“Eep!” She squeaked, shooting up off the ground and onto her feet. “At least I’ve come out of that machine as me for once and not some piece of clothing. It feels almost odd being this size again.” She looked around and sure enough, he dad had left out the pile of clothes out for her to change into so she wouldn’t have to walk through the house naked to get dressed. Her mom had grabbed one of here swimsuits, a plain white top, and some plain jeans and a belt.

She soon headed upstairs to grab soon food before she had to head over to her aunt and uncle’s house to babysit Kim. Seeing the clock, she knew she only had 5 minutes to eat, so she make up 2 pieces of toast and got to eating. She overheard her Dad saying something to her sister about ‘It’s ready’ and then they both headed to the basement. She didn’t think much of it and finished her meal before her mom came in and told her she had to leave. The whole drive to her relatives house, she was dreading how annoying Kim was going to be. Kim was the kind of child that always got everything she wanted and was a complete prima donna. The only thing she could take comfort in was that Kim had no idea about her new abilities, so as long as nothing triggered them, she wouldn’t have to worry about being a dress or anything for Kim.

As she arrived, her aunt and uncle were just leaving and shouted out of their car window “Have fun you two!” and drove off down the street. Kristen Turned around to find Kim right next to her.

“Hey Kuz, ready to have some fun?” Kim shouted in a high pitch only she could hit. She was wearing a yellow bikini and huge sunglasses looking to swim.

“Ugh, yeah, why don’t you head back to the pool and I’ll meet you there.” Kim just made a happy squealing noise and ran off to the backyard. ‘Its only for a few hours Kristen kept repeating to her self. For over an hour Kristen just sat at the edge of the concrete and grass in their backyard and watched her Cousin have fun in the water. At least every five minutes, Kim would ask her to join her in the water, but each time, she would say she was good.

Finally Kim got tired of this and decided she was going to make her have some fun with her. “Krissy, if you don’ t have some fun in the pool with me, I’m going to tell my mom that you had a boy over.”

Kristen just glared at Kim knowing that her aunt would of course believe her own daughter over her teenage niece. “Fine…” She began to strip down to her swim suit and headed to the edge of the pool. “But when your parents get back, you tell them I was great, ok?” Kim just nodded. Kristen lowered herself into the pool and waded around a bit till the brat was satisfied. At which point, Kim went back to diving around the bottom of the pool follow the automated pool cleaning around the base of the pool.

Kristen was just happy that she hadn’t had he powers showcased yet, but that was all about to change. She wasn’t paying attention, and while standing in the shallow end of the pool the automated cleaner ran into her. She didn’t notice at first until she tried to move and couldn’t. Looking down into the water, she saw that her foot had disappeared in the machine. She trying to move away but her other foot just slide along the pool floor and it also got caught by the machine.The evil robot was obviously expensive as her legs didn’t stop it and it continued up her body and all she could do was keep herself afloat with her arms. Kim came out from under the water and and just stared at her baby sitter. “Kriss…” Kim had been watching it all happen from underwater and didn’t know what to think.

“You can’t tell you parents about this.” The now half eaten girl said as it continued it journey up her body. “I’m going to need your help to get out of this.” She continued, but Kim just kept staring till it passed her waist only made the slightest stutter as it worked past her chest. Finally at her neck, Kim regained her movement and swam to the edge of the pool. She ran to the cord in the wall ripped it out. Unfortunately, she wasn’t fast enough and the evil machine had already sucked in her head and arms.

She pulled on the automated cleaned by the cord and reeled it in to the edge of the pool where she pulled it out and set it on the ground. “Ugh, Kuz, you in there?” Kim said hesitantly. Light mumbles where the only sound Kristen could make, but it was enough for Kim to know that she had really just seen her cousin get sucked in by the pool cleaner and she hadn’t imaged it. Although, being how young Kim was, she only had one response. “Cool! How’d you do that?” Mumbles were all she could hear again. “Oh yeah, better get you out.” Although Kim couldn’t fathom the machine, she kept working at it till one of the sides popped open and she pulled out the filter, to which a blue glob was stuck to. “Ewww, whats that?”
1111111.title: Babysitting

11111111.content:
Finally being released from her prison, she was able to speak, “Oh, yeah, that would probably be me…” Kim held the filter with the blue mush in front of her and inspected it.

“Sure, doesn’t look like you.”

“Well it is. Its a bit of a long story, but since we’re already here, I might as well tell you my body is quite malleable now.”

“So you’re ok? You can just be mushed up and you’ll be fine?” Kim ask seeming very intrigued.

“Yeah, its not totally comfortable, but I’m alright.” Kristen tried to reform herself but felt bogged down. “Ugh, looks like I absorbed quite a bit of water, an ideas?” Kristen asked a bit scared about the answer, although Kim didn’t reply. She just began peeling her babysitter out of the the filter. She made quick work of it though and in no time had all the blue goop in her hands. She rolled her into a small blue ball and headed inside, going straight for the basement.

“My mom has an old antique wringer that’ll be prefect.” Opening the door to the basement, she hit the light and walked about until she found the machine. It really did look old, at least 100 had passed since it had been used, but worst of all, the space in between the rollers liked impossibly thin. But at this point, she knew nothing was impossible for her. Kim pushed her to the edge of the rollers and began to crank. As she was pulled through, Kristen could feel the immense pressure on her from the rollers but it did feel as if it was doing its job and soon enough a much more disced Krsiten dropped out of the back on the floor with a splat.

“Oh, that’s much better, I don’t feel so full of water now.”

“Hmmm, but you’re not quite thin enough.” Kim said flatly standing over her blue disc of a cousin.” If Kristen has eyes, they’d be wide at that comment. Kim moved back over the the wringer and adjusted the rollers so they were so close the looked as if they were touching.

“Wait, why do I need to be MMmmmm…” she said as Kim stuffed her back in the wringer and turned it watching as a paper thin blue disc came out the other side about the size of a plate that fluttered to the ground and landed in a heap. “Hey, what was that all about? I felt fine after the first run through!” But there was no one there to hear her, Kim had already disappeared. “great, leave me in a pile on the floor, guess I’ll try and reform now… OUCH!” She felt Kim stick her with something that felt like a needle. “What are you doing?”

“Well you didn’t look like you were having much fun in the pool before and I want to change that.” Before Kristen could even respond she felt a burst of air shoot into her, then another, and the air continued to floor till her body was more of a saucer shape and she could see what Kim had, and it just confirmed her worst nightmares. A bicycle pump. Kim kept pumping for what felt like hours and Kristen could just feel her less than paper thin body stretching and ever expanding along with the air. She knew there was no resisting it and figured it was as good a time as ever to maybe try and enjoy some time with her cousin for once. After 15 intense minutes of pump, a quite bouncy and slightly lighter blue ball was sitting on the ground.

“Alright, fine, lets have some fun.” Kim’s eyes went wide with excitement. She grabbed Kristen and sprinted back to outside giving the ball a good kick sending her across the porch and into the pool where she bounced off the surface a few times and came to a rest by the far edge where she could clearly see Kim jumping into the pool in a classic cannonball form splashing water everywhere and sending wakes through the pool then Kristen could feel lifting her up and dropping her back down again. Oddly enough, the kick didn’t even hurt, she hardly felt it. Kim came up from under her knocking her into the air with her head and proceeded to practice her volleyball skills with her Cousin.

After at least 2 hours of playing, Kim had thoroughly tired herself out and took a break holding tight onto Kristen so she wouldn’t float away. “Wow, that was actually pretty fun.” Kristen said as best she could with her mouth up against her Cousin’s stomach.

“Yeah, its much funner to practice when the ball talks back even if you are a bit bigger than a regular volley ball.” Kim said giggling. “Now its time to relax, well at least for me. I really want to see what else I can do with you like this.”

“What were you thinking?” Kristen responded.

“Well to be honest, I was kind of wondering how far you can stretch…” Kristen could see that Kim was actually a bit embarrassed to ask the question, but she figured that since she was having a good time so far and she knew one day she would need to know just how far she could go, she said something she never thought she’d say.

“Go for it. Go as far with me as you can and ignore what ever I say while you’re doing it.” Kim’s eyes lit up with excitement. She hopped out of the pool and grabbed Kristen from the water. Kim looked at the ball and Kristen could see thoughts going through her head. After a second more of ideas passing through her mind, she reaches behind her head and pulls out a pin from her hair. Unlike a regular hair pin though, this one looked quite sharp on one end. The blue ball of a girl knew that as much as she was about to have what was going to happen, she knew it had to be done to get the air out of her.

Kim brought the needle down slowly into her rubbery skin though and pressed it in just a bit to make a hole and let the air out slowly. Kristen thought for sure she was about to get popped and either send shards of her all of over of she would fly around the back yard like a balloon. But the slowly leaking air didn’t actually feel that bad, like most things that day, it actually felt kind of good. She was starting to wonder if maybe it had always felt good, but she never noticed being too preoccupied with the whole body being reformed into an object thing.

It took a little while, but soon enough she looked just like a deflated blue basket ball. Kim set her in the center of the large grassy area in the backyard and ran inside. She came back out with the air pump from before, the water hose, a blow dryer, and camping steaks. “Don’t worry, you wont feel like a vampire.” Kim said knowing the Kristen was probably have some reservations after seeing the spikes. She stuck on into the ground to begin with and stretched a piece of Kristen and tied it around it so she would stay in place. After get a firm hold on her cousin, she began to slowly back away, stretching Kristen. At first, it wasn’t too bad, but after five feet, her world began to feel a bit skewed. At ten feet, things began to feel very odd. At fifteen feet, her mind was shout to stay stop, but she held it in as best she could all the way up to twenty five feet where it seemed that Kim had finally hit her max as well and couldn’t pull her any further. She stuck a steak in the ground and tied a strand of Kristen around it.

She then began to pull out from the center of the long blue, Kristen strip, in both directions making a square shape and then proceeded to make sure they were tightly in place as well. The whole Kristen’s mind was going crazy. She had never even been close to this stretched before, and know that here was only more to come. “Half way there Cuz, Well at least with the stretching, hehe.” At least Kim was having fun. After four more spikes in four more directions, Kristen was spread out into a nice blue octagon on the grass. “Step two!” Kim said happily. She returned shortly with the blow dryer, which must have been battery powered as there was no cord Kristen could see. Kim then went to work blowing super heated air all around the edge of Kristen’s stretched form about a foot in. The malleable girl realized that she was in fact still hollow from when she was a ball and that Kim was creating some sort of seal. But it all became clear when Kim finished and went back for the air pump. She began to pump air into the sealed edge and soon Kristen was not just a flat piece of plastic, but had a large inflated ring around the edge.

“Almost done!” Kim piped in after finishing inflating the tube around Kristen’s edge. She headed back and returned with the hose, water already flowing out of the end and onto her rubber surface. As the water began to spread, Kim walked around Kristen and undid all of the spikes. As the water began to rise, Kristen realized what she had done, the clever girl that Kim was. As the water got higher, her inflated ring would float on top and rise her edges up. Unfortunately it took over and hour to fill her with water, in which time Kim had left, eaten some food, watched an episode of her favorite show on tv and changed into another bikini. Not only have she become something bigger than a car, but she was full or water and could feel it slosh about inside her walls. “I’m… I’m a pool.” Kristen said a bit still in disbelief. Kim just stood next to her with a look of pride on her face. “Well hop in why don’t ya?” Kristen said.

Kim shook her daze of happiness to move back a feel feet. She got a running start and jumped over Kristen’s edge and dove skillfully into the water. Even her artfully done dive though caused the water to slosh about much more than before, and Kristen could feel it moving her whole form around till it finally settled. Being in a good mood, Kristen found she could gain control over her new form much easier and was able to splash the water around and soak Kim. This escalated into a game quickly with Kim diving under the water and Kristen trying to figure out where she’d come up so she come splash her.

Having so much fun though, the two lost track of time, and before they new it, there was a sound of a car pulling up in the driveway. Both girls went silent realizing that Kristen’s mom was back to pick her up, only problem was that she was still a swimming pool. Kim hopped over the edge and ran into the house to get the door. The second she was out of site, Kristen began to try to reform herself, but she had no luck. She had learned how to move quite a bit but couldn’t get her floating rim past the water. After ten minutes of being gone, Kim and Kristen’s mom came outside and all she heard was her mom saying, “What do you mean I can’t see her…” she stopped short seeing the blue pool in the middle of the yard. She walked up to edge and cautiously said “Krissy?”

“Hey mom, hehe.” Her mom just reached her arm out and felt her side. “Yeah its me.”

“The whole pool?”

“Yeah, it was a bit of a test to see of big I could get and we got a bit carried away.”

“I can tell, but we really should be getting home. Any idea how to drain you?” Her mom asked.

Kim’s eyes lit up again with obvious light that she had an idea. She ran off and came back with what looked like a hose, but was attached to a little motor. Sticking one end into the water, she turned it on and it went to work sucking all of the water out of Kristen and spraying it across the yard. Unlike when they were filling her though, this went much quicker, and before they knew it, Kim flipped the machine off, her and Kristen’s mom looking at a pile of rubber in the obvious shape of a pool. “Didn’t happen to bring the MEZ’er with you, did ya mom?” Kristen asked.

“Sorry, nope, I expected that even if you had gotten into some other shape you’d be at least a bit easy to take with me. Think you can pull yourself back together?” Kristen tried a bit to pull herself in, but it appeared that the water holding her body up had made moving easier, and although she had gained more control over her body, she was no where near prepared to fix herself from this size.

“Looks like a no.”

Kim and her aunt just looked at each other shrugged. “Guess there’s only one option then.” said Kristen’s mother. She looked over to Kim and nodded to her, Kim just nodded back. Then they each got to one side of Kristen and began to roll, trying to keep her in as tight a circle as possible. It took a bit of finesse with Kim holding her tight and her mom rolling, but soon enough Kristen was rolled up into a nice tight tube, that they then folded over twice till she was only about as big as a canoe. “Not as easy as the MEZ’er, but it’ll do. Thanks for the help Kim.” Kristen’s mom said as she threw her daughter over her should and headed back to her car. She tossed her on top of her station wagon and tied her down to the roof racks.

“Think dad will be able to fix me?” Kristen asked, a bit worried for once. “I don’t really want to be an inflatable pool for the rest of my life.”

“Your father is brilliant, you know he’ll be able to figure it out. And worse comes to it, we could always use you at the gym.” She said snickering as she secured the final ties. 111111111.title: Babysitting part 3

1111111111.content:
Soon enough the mother and daughter were home and Kristen’s Mom began untying her from the roof. After Kristen had let her Cousin Kim test her stretching abilities and she had become an inflatable pool, she was in not position to complain about having to be rolled up and stored on the roof of the car for the ride home. She was just hoping it wouldn’t be something she’d have to do again any time soon. Her Mom had reassured her that her dad would be able to restore her though.

Tossing Kristen over her shoulder, her mother brought her inside and laid her down in the living room at which point her dad walked in and took only a second to figure out what had happened. “Wow Krissy, you really have gotten your self stretched out haven’t you? Good thing Karen went to the convention early or she’d have a ball with her new, uh… never mind, Lets just get you fixed up.” Quickly her mom skipped over to her dad and whispered something in her ear. “Yeah I could attach them, what were you thinking?” he asked her. She then whispered some more in his ear and he nodded along as she spoke to him without Kristen being able to hear a word. “Ahhh, yes, well I’m up for it if she is.”

Her Mom then turned around and smiled at Kristen, who was still rolled up laying on the floor. “Someone mind cluing me in to what you guys are talking about?” Kristen asked.

“Well you know that convention that you and your sis are going to?” The convention was one for any sort of comic, sci-fi, or video game nerd where they got to see upcoming projects and can dress as their favorite characters. “Well I flipped through some of your comics a few weeks ago and got really into this one about these four super heroes. Long story short, I really connected with the mom and was wondering if I could come to the convention with you guys?”

Kristen was confused as almost everyone who went wore a costume of their favorite character, and by the sound of it, her mother wanted to do the same, but she hadn’t ever seen her working on a costume or anything. “Well ok, but we need an extra ticket then and what was all the whispering about?”

“Well, as I’m sure you know, her outfit is a nice shiny blue with a few black bits on it, and well you are the perfect shade of blue!” That’s when it hit her. Her mom wanted Kristen to be her costume for the Con. It would solve the issue of needing an extra ticket for her mother to come along, but Kristen really didn’t want to spend the whole time being worn and was still a bit confused as to how they would attach the black bits. “And don’t worry about the black parts, that’s what I was asking your dad about, he has an adhesive that should attach some of the extra black rubber from your costume and we can remove it when ever you want.

“So you think I could become me again during? After all, I’ve already made my costume.” Kristen asked.

“Of course, after all, I’m pretty sure your sis has something to show you. But first, we’ve got to reduce you a bit. So, Jack?” She looked to her husband. He just brought his hand to his chin and thought for a second.

“Got it!” He said. He ran into another room and came back with the MEZ’er and another weird looking device. “This will probably be pretty warm Kristen, but this is going to be the only way to get you down to size so you’re going to have to trust me.” He then handed the MEZ’er to Kristen’s mother and activated the other device which suddenly began to glow. As he brought it down to her side, Kristen could feel the heat of it working away at her and realized it was some sort of super heated knife and it was cutting right through hwe like a hot knife through butter, or more like rubber in this case. It took only a minute to cut of a slice that was about 1/6th of Kristen’s full pool form. He pushed the rolled up slice over to Jennifer, his wife and said, “Now that should be small enough for the MEZ’er to compress and store. As he began on the next piece, Jennifer began to suck the slice into the MEZ’er and have it set to work on compressing it.

It was the strangest feeling Kristen had ever experienced since she had gained her new abilities. She was being crushed, and smashed and sucked on all at once, all in different places. It was actually quite thrilling, but soon enough he had finished cutting the last piece in half and her mom sucked both into the device she was getting all too familiar with, and felt that same feeling of getting smaller and smaller till there was a light ding and she dropped into her Mom’s hand, the size of a AA battery. “Good as new, eh Krissy?” Her mom asked.

Luckily for Kristen, her father had designed the MEZ’er in such a way that in this compressed for she could still talk and responded with, “Well not quite my original form, but the machine downstairs should be able to work me into a nice costume in no time. Don’t forget to do your hair and everything though mom, you’ve got to look the part too.”

“Oh yeah, thanks!” Her mom burst out and tossed Kristen to her dad as she ran down the hall into her bedroom to get ready.

“Guess lets get you ready kid-o.” He took her down stairs and put her into the entrance of the machine along with the extra bits of black rubber left over from her costume and one piece of gold fabric that must be his own addition. Oh, this machine can form regular rubber as well? Wish I would have though of that when I had to make my costume. She though as the rollers started up and she fell into the machine. He father really had been improving it as it took only minutes for the finished product to fall out of the completion chute nicely folded and ready to be worn. Only seconds lately her mom came down the stairs to show off her new look ready for her costume.

Her husband almost had a heart attack when he saw that she had cut her hair incredibly short for her character. “Could you possibly design something to regrow hair while we’re out Hun?” She asked of her still awestruck husband. “Thanks Hun, gotta go!” she said, not even giving him time to answer and grabbing Kristen from the tray, heading out the door.

11111111111.content:
