Heading out of the bathroom, Kristen saw her mother and her in the mirror and figured out that she must have been planning to ask for some time, because the costume, her, was so well done, it must have taken her soon time to design on a computer and put in the machine. She just wished her mom had put a bit more around her chest as the second she hit the convention floor, she was getting swamped by guys and photographers asking for photos of and with her.

Even being is such a constrained form, Kristen was having a good time knowing she would end up in tons of pics on blogs and sites and she didn’t have to do anything besides being worn and trying not to let one of her mother’s nips show.

After and hour or so, the crowds died down and they could finally begin exploring the booths. Of course the first one her mother looked for, was the one of the series of which she was currently wearing a costume for. Unfortunately for the both of them, its was on the other side of the complex. For Kristen’s mother, the walking is what was killing her, but for Kristen her self, it was that of trying to control the bounce from her mother’s ample breasts that was tiring her out. It reminded her of her day as a sports bra for Karen only times ten.

After making it across the entire center and getting the signature of the creator, her mom figured it was time that she could go back to normal. She she found the closest bathroom she could and headed in with her street clothes and Kristen’s costume. After sliding her daughter off slowly, she got back into her regular clothes and detached the black pieces from Kristen so she could restore her self without having bits of rubber stuck to her all over.

In Kristen’s previous forms, it had always been hard for her to become normal again without the help of the machine due to her odd shapes, but for once, she was already in a fairly human shape, and after working for a bit, her mother watched in amazement as she began to move about, connecting parts of herself together and extending bits out to become her hands and feet. It still took her about 5 minutes, but it was fine for Kristen as it was the first time she had restore herself without any help.

Her mom handed her her costume and left the bathroom so she could change in piece. In no times she was in her Black Spider outfit and ready for the Con. She had to make the most of it since, although it was 2 days long, only Karen had a ticket to the second day. She wandered though the booths looking for any actors or writers that she recognized to get their autographs.

That is when she saw her sister, Karen, across the room getting the signature of an actor who played her favorite villain. She was happy that her sister hadn’t had the pleasure of seeing her as the Invisible-Maid’s costume, although she knew at some point she would see the pictures online. Karen soon saw her as well and the met up through the crown of people. “Seen anyone cool?” Karen asked.

“A few, yourself?” Kristen responded, happy to make small talk with her sister for once, although still wondering what her parents were talking about when they said she would have something to show Kristen.

“Two of my favorite villains.” Karen said.

They continued to make small talk till eventually the question ate at Kristen enough that she had to ask. “So Mom and Dad said you have something new to show me? Is it what you left the beach for early that one day to do with Dad?”

Karen then got a devilish smirk on her face. “That is it. He saw how much I liked what you could do and wanted it to be fair.” Kristen has always suspected that Karen was a bit jealous of her abilities, but never knew Karen had talked to their dad about it. “But you used up all of Dad’s Blueium, so he had to make something new that would work in a similar way. Fortunately you acted as a good test for the properties of Blueium and he was able to make a new substance in no time. So he made Redium, and using a safer method of combining than what you went through, he put it in me.”

Kristen was blown away. Her sister now had abilities like her, although with something called Redium. She just couldn’t believe it, “No way, then what can you do?” she asked Karen.

“Just watch!” She pulled Kristen aside and next to a potted plant. “Check this.” She backed off a bit and then ran at the potted plant suddenly becoming transparent as she got close. Her form appeared to merge with the pot and it turned a bright shade of red. “Unlike you, I don’t change my form, I can merge with any other non-living object and we become one.” She said as she shook the plant back and forth. Now Kristen was a believer, although not very surprised, as her father is quite the brainiac. She was happy for her sister now though, after all, maybe without the jealousy there, she wouldn’t be as tempted to use Kristen as clothing or a play thing. Probably not, but she could hope.

“So what gets you stuck in your form, like electricity does for me?” Kristen asked a bit jokingly to see if there was a way she might be able to keep her sis as a pot for the rest of the convention.

“For your information, me and Dad don’t know what caused that effect to Redium, but even if I knew I would never tell you!”

“Fine.” Kristen said kicking the plant almost knocking it over as Karen steadied her self at the last moment. “Hehe.” Kristen giggled a bit, starting to understand the feeling that Karen might have felt all the times she had played with her in her Blueium forms. Karen Quickly unmerged with the pot after that and just looked at Kristen angrily. “Oh calm down, getting played with as an object is something you better get used to.

“Pfft, I’ll play with you…” Karen said under her breathe as Kristen turned around. She then ran up behind her sister and merged with her costume turning it a bright shade of red. Kristen could feel the force from behind her as she looked down and saw her new outfit. Karen tried to move Kristen’s arms, but a rubber suit was no match for her and she easily pushed through her sister. “Stop resisting!”

“Ha! Now you know how I feel, you have no control as clothing, trust me.” At that moment, a girl walked by spraying hair spray all over her massively poofy hair, and a bit went to the side and got on Kristen’s costume. Immediately Kristen could feel Karen as her costume tighten it up all over her body. “Oof, ok that’s a bit tight, might loosening up?”

“Uh, that’s not me…” Karen said blankly. “And I feel weird now, I gotta get outta this thing.”

Kristen just looked down and stared at her red body suit. “Ok, then get to it.”

“I’m trying! I feel like its holding me in, whats up with your suit?” That’s when it hit Kristen. The hair spray must have had some effect on the Redium and it causes it to hold it’s merge. She assumed it must be something in the compressed aerosol but stop thinking about it quickly realizing her sister who had always tormented her was now her outfit, and she could really show her what it felt like.

“Guess we know what your electric shock is eh?” Kristen said giggling. Karen’s heart dropped as she knew that now she was in the hands of her sister, who was ready to get some payback. “This will certainly make it easier for both of us to use you ticket tomorrow. And just like me, I’m sure Dad wont mind me keeping you like this for a bit as he works out a solution. Karen had only had her powers for a little while but she already knew how Kristen had felt being so vulnerable and so used.

Kristen spent the rest of the day exploring the Con finding some of her favorite actors and buying a few limited edition comics. When the end of the day finally came, their father showed up to pick them both up and Kristen told him exactly what happened, and like she expected he said she could keep Karen for a bit as he worked on some ideas as to what would reverse it.

Once home, Kristen changed out of her sister, neatly folding her and sticking her in her dresser, much to Karen’s dismay, but once the drawer was closed, she could hardly hear her moaning about it.
